{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCWBR14 |revision=-3GN |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/08/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=MR3306A |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDWBR143GN |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT1310A |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9864G6GH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=SMC |default_ssid_regex=^SMC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Mobile 3G Router}} :[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&localeCode=EN_GBR&cid=5&scid=118&pid=1684 Product page] (UK)
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=22374 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :Specs mentioned as [[Ralink]] RT1310A CPU, RT2860RT WiFi, :''Winbond'' W9864G6GH-6 RAM, ''VIA'' VT6212L [[USB Host Controllers|USB 2.0 controller]]
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''SMC'''. :'''SMC1''' is the second default SSID.. :but it may not be enabled by default.
